headline: Change Foods achieves dairy-identical cheese using precision fermentation.
summary: Successfully produced vegan cheese with the same protein structure as cow's milk using precision fermentation.

headline: Bolt Threads announces large-scale production of Mylo mushroom leather.
summary: Scaling up Mylo production to meet demand from fashion brands seeking sustainable leather alternatives.

headline: Solar Foods expands production of Solein protein using air-based fermentation.
summary: Expanding Solein production capacity, showcasing the potential of air-based protein creation.

headline: Modern Synthesis raises funding to scale microbial textile production.
summary: Secured investment to increase production of their bacterial cellulose-based textile alternative.

headline: Perfect Day partners with Nestle to create vegan dairy ice cream.
summary: Collaboration with Nestle to develop and launch vegan ice cream using Perfect Day's whey protein.

headline: Algiknit secures partnership to develop seaweed-based yarns for apparel.
summary: Partnership to expand the use of seaweed-derived yarns in the apparel industry, replacing conventional textiles.

headline: Motif FoodWorks launches new heme-containing vegan burger patty.
summary: Introduced a new vegan burger patty utilizing heme protein for enhanced flavor and texture.

headline: Biomason expands production of bio-based cement alternatives.
summary: Increased production of their cement alternative grown with microorganisms, reducing CO2 emissions.

headline: The Every Co. announces FDA approval for their egg white protein.
summary: Received FDA approval, paving the way for broader use of their fermentation-derived egg white protein.

headline: Mango Materials announces new facility for PHA production from methane.
summary: New facility for PHA production, converting methane into biodegradable plastic alternatives.
